name: votca-csg

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

variants.name: generator
variants.description: the build system generator to use

description:
Versatile Object-oriented Toolkit for Coarse-graining Applications
(VOTCA) is a package intended to reduce the amount of routine work when
doing systematic coarse-graining of various systems. The core is written
in C++. This package contains the VOTCA coarse-graining engine.

dependencies.name: cmake
dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: ninja
dependencies.description:
Ninja is a small build system with a focus on speed. It differs from
other build systems in two major respects: it is designed to have its
input files generated by a higher-level build system, and it is designed
to run builds as fast as possible.

dependencies.name: votca-tools
dependencies.description:
Versatile Object-oriented Toolkit for Coarse-graining Applications
(VOTCA) is a package intended to reduce the amount of routine work when
doing systematic coarse-graining of various systems. The core is written
in C++. This package contains the basic tools library of VOTCA.

dependencies.name: boost
dependencies.description:
Boost provides free peer-reviewed portable C++ source libraries,
emphasizing libraries that work well with the C++ Standard Library.
Boost libraries are intended to be widely useful, and usable across a
broad spectrum of applications. The Boost license encourages both
commercial and non-commercial use.

dependencies.name: gromacs
dependencies.description:
GROMACS is a molecular dynamics package primarily designed for
simulations of proteins, lipids and nucleic acids. It was originally
developed in the Biophysical Chemistry department of University of
Groningen, and is now maintained by contributors in universities and
research centers across the world. GROMACS is one of the fastest and
most popular software packages available and can run on CPUs as well as
GPUs. It is free, open source released under the GNU Lesser General
Public License. Before the version 4.6, GROMACS was released under the
GNU General Public License.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependent_to.name: votca-ctp
dependent_to.description:
Versatile Object-oriented Toolkit for Coarse-graining Applications
(VOTCA) is a package intended to reduce the amount of routine work when
doing systematic coarse-graining of various systems. The core is written
in C++. This package contains the VOTCA charge transport engine.

dependent_to.name: votca-csg-tutorials
dependent_to.description:
Versatile Object-oriented Toolkit for Coarse-graining Applications
(VOTCA) is a package intended to reduce the amount of routine work when
doing systematic coarse-graining of various systems. The core is written
in C++. This package contains the VOTCA coarse-graining tutorials.

dependent_to.name: votca-csgapps
dependent_to.description:
Versatile Object-oriented Toolkit for Coarse-graining Applications
(VOTCA) is a package intended to reduce the amount of routine work when
doing systematic coarse-graining of various systems. The core is written
in C++. This package contains the VOTCA coarse-graining extra apps.

dependent_to.name: votca-xtp
dependent_to.description:
Versatile Object-oriented Toolkit for Coarse-graining Applications
(VOTCA) is a package intended to reduce the amount of routine work when
doing systematic coarse-graining of various systems. The core is written
in C++. This package contains the VOTCA exciton transport engine.
